summary: A wealthy East Indian man gives an apparently non-East Indian woman a crash course in his culture, so he can marry her with his family's approval.
cast: Rahul Khanna|Lisa Ray|Moushumi Chatterjee|Dina Pathak|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Ranjit Chowdhry|Jessica Paré|Rishma Malik|Jasbir Mann|Arjun Lombardi-Singh|Leesa Gaspari|Neelam Mansingh|Killer Khalsa Singh|Jolly Bader|Ronica Sajnani|Jeremy Chow|Damon D'Oliveira|Nicky Gill|Nicole Innis|Rohan Bader|Terry Stevens|Rupinder Nagra|Anne Mroczkowski|Neeta Tandon|Karamjit Singh|Vinod Suri|Sveta Kohli|Larissa Gomes|Manjit Bumrah|Imali Perera|Artee Suri|Caryn Green|Monisha Randhawa|Pragna Desai|Akshaye Khanna|Sofonda|Mike Cota|Sitara Hewitt|Kat Osen|Misakiu|Sunny Dhillon|Starsah Lauriten|Vincent Tong|Candi Barr|Linda Garneau|Christina Lee|Mike Tracz|Bhavin Lodhia|David Lopez|Chad McFadden|Jodi McFadden|Alana Upcraft|Jena Van Eslander|Elena Vazintaris|Jason Westlake|Angie Canuel|Sarah Connell|Lindy Booth|Pak Daddy|Michael Thandi
